moves.1. e4 e5 2. d4: He goes to one of my favorite openings. Center Game.
moves.2... exd4 3. c3: I thought things were headed to the Danish gambit.
moves.3... dxc3 4. Nxc3: Apperantly he wasn't interested in saccing another pawn.
moves.8... Nxf3+: I capture... with check. (The second intermezzo)
moves.12... Qg4+: !! I take advantage of his exposed king. He resigned. (The third intermezzo)
